scripts.build: npm run build:js | npm run build:css
scripts.build:fp:js: browserify --full-paths -d app/index.js -o build/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015  ] --plugins [ inferno ] ]
scripts.build:js: browserify --debug -d app/index.js -o build/bundle.js  -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ inferno ] ]
scripts.watch:js: watchify --debug -d app/index.js -o build/bundle.js  -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015  ] --plugins [ inferno ] ]
scripts.start: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css & npm run serve
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js | npm run minify:css
scripts.bundle:analysis: npm run build:fp:js && npm run minify:js && discify build/bundle.min.js > disc.html --open
scripts.production:build: npm run build:css | npm run production:build:js
scripts.production: npm run production:build && npm run minify
scripts.production:build:js: NODE_ENV=production browserify -d app/index.js -o build/bundle.js  -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ inferno ] ]
scripts.publish: npm run production && npm run production:publish
